creditline: Gift of Edward A. Studzinski, Chicago, IL
description: sculptural form; vessel on its side with elongated vertical slit mouth opening on one side; opposite end (near bottom) has vertical rough slit opening; cracked, planar elements on walls; black patina with some reddish undertones
